org.orgName: Western District Court of Washington, Northern Division.

body.p: STATE OF WASHINGTON COUNTY OF KING SS

Samuel H. Weber being first duly sworn on oath, deposes and says; That he is one of the signers of the bond in the case of the alien L. Orloff, that he resides at 1509 E. Spruce St. in the coty of Seattle, Washington, and that the value of his property over and above all debts and liabilities incurred by him and exclusive of propertyy exempt from levy and sale upon execution is over Two Thousand dollars ($2000.00)- to wit Real Estate in the City of Seattle, to the One Hundred and Twenty (120) feet of the South Sixty (60) feed of the North ONe Hundred and twenty (120) ett of the Tract 39 of esler's Donation Claim to the Cicty of Seattle, and that the present fair value of Depolots at 119-121 60th Street and the present fair value of Deponennt's interest is One Thousand Dollars ($1000.0 ); and personal property consisting of a ladies tailoring establishment at 406 Union St., Seattle Washington, consisting of Fixtures in the value of over $1000.00, and raxxgoods, and one half interst of raw goods, the same amounting to over $2000.00, that he is now liable upon no other bond, obligation, ricognizance, either as principal or surety except as hereinafter stated. eponent further states that he is of full age and under no disability to execute the foregoing bond.
subscribed and sworn to before me this 24 day of February, 1914
Notary Public in and for the State of Washington residing at Seattle.

Samuel Cohen ExxHekFaxd being first duly sworn on oath, deposes and says; taht he is one of the signers of the bond in the case of the Alien L. Orliff that he resides at No. 2205 E. Spruce St. Seattle, Wash, and that the value of his property over and above all debts and liabilities incurred by him and exclusive of property exempt from levy and sale upon execution is over $1000.00 to wit one half interes "North-Western Cloack and suit Mfg. CO., at 1329- 1st Ave., Seattle, Wash, and that the value of said business is over $8000.00; that he is now liable upon no other bond, obligation, or recognizance, either as principal or surety except as herinafter stated. Deponent further says; that he is of full age and under no legal disability to execute the foregoing bond.
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 24 day of February, 1914
Notary Public in and for the State of Washington residing at Seattle.
DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OFFICE OF UNITED STATES DISTRICT ATTORNEY.
Examined and approved as to form and execution
